S04jnalokau:304_0: sa ca mañjuśrīr mahābrahmācyavamānas tato brahmavimānād anyam adhitiṣṭhati mahābrahmāṇaṃ
S04jnalokau:306: sa ca mañjuśrīr nirmito mahābrahmā divase divase sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayati,
S04jnalokau:308: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena sarveṣu devanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svakasvakān kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāṃs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītiṃ praśamayitvā,
S04jnalokau:309: kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṃ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṃ vyavalokayanti sma /
S04jnalokau:310: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhūrtaṃ darśanaṃ dadāti, na ca sthānāc calati /
S04jnalokau:311: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim ākāṅkṣanti,
S04jnalokau:315: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadevanikāyeṣu darśanābhāso bhavati,
S04jnalokau:316: tasyaiva mahābrahmaṇaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena /
S04jnalokau:317: na ca mañjuśrīs teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām evaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:320: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śūnyo vaśiko 'bhūto 'nakṣaro 'ghoṣo 'deśo 'bhāvo 'cintyo 'nimittaś cittamanovijñānāpagato 'nutpanno 'niruddhaḥ /
S04jnalokau:321: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena,
S04jnalokau:324: na ca mañjuśrīr ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ caivaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:326: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatātmabhāvāl lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtāt sarvatathāgateryāpatheṣu śūnyeṣu nānāvidhivicitrāṇāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahādharmadeśanā niścarati /
S04jnalokau:327: sā ca dharmadeśanā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
S04jnalokau:328: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samayaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
S04jnalokau:329: tad anenāpi te mañjuśrīḥ paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
S04jnalokau:332: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat /
S04jnalokau:334: anutpādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
S04jnalokau:335: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayo asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke // 1 //
S04jnalokau:336: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
S04jnalokau:337: na cātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // 2 //
S04jnalokau:344: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo jambūdvīpe pūrvataram eva tāvad mahāśailendrarājānam avabhāsayanti /
S04jnalokau:347: tataḥ paścād iha jambūdvīpe nimnān pṛthivīpradeśān avabhāsayanti /
S04jnalokau:348: te ca mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo na kalpayanti, na vikalpayanti, na cintayanti, na vicintayanti /
S04jnalokau:365: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivyām uccanīcamadhyaviśeṣeṇa hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāvabhāsasya cchāyā vaicitryaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:366: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kalpayati,
S04jnalokau:404: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalajñānaraśmayas traidhātuke 'nantamadhyadharmadhātvapratihataraśmyavabhāsapramuktāḥ /
S04jnalokau:405: prasṛtāś ca raśmayaḥ pūrvataram eva mahāśailendrakalpādhyāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:408: tataḥ paścāt kuśalādhyāśayānāṃ yathādhimuktīnāṃ sattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:409: tataḥ paścād antaśo mithyātvaniyateṣu sattvasaṃtāneṣu kāye tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalaraśmayo nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:410: teṣāṃ copakārībhūtā bhavanty anāgatahetusaṃjananatayā, saṃvardhayanti ca kuśalair dharmaiḥ /
S04jnalokau:411: tatra ca tathāgato mañjuśrīḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
S04jnalokau:413: asyāhaṃ sattvasyodāraṃ [JĀA_40] dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi, asya na deśayiṣyāmīti /
S04jnalokau:418: ayaṃ kuśalāśayaḥ, ayaṃ hīno mithyāśaya iti /
S04jnalokau:423: kuśalākuśalāśayānāṃ ca sattvānām āśayaṃ viditvā viśodhayiṣyāmi, ṛjukāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ kariṣyāmi /
S04jnalokau:424: yāvad mithyātvaniyatānām api sattvānāṃ yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi /
S04jnalokau:428: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalāśayasaṃtānavaicitryāt tathāgatajñānasūryamaṇḍalaraśmyavabhāsasya vaicitryaṃ bhavati //
S04jnalokau:435: tadyathā mañjuśrīr asti mahāsāgare sarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tad dhvajāgrāvabaddham /
S04jnalokau:437: tādṛśaṃ tataḥ [JĀA_41] śabdaṃ niścarantaṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:438: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04jnalokau:440: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04jnalokau:469: na nāma na rūpaṃ na nimittam,
S04jnalokau:478: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatajñānaratnam adhyāśayapariśuddhaṃ mahākaruṇādhvajāgrāvabaddham,
S04jnalokau:479: tato yo yathāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ sa tathā dharmadeśanāṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānāti /
S04jnalokau:480: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ //
S04jnalokau:487: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkām anyarutavijñaptito niścarantīṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:488: sā ca nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S04jnalokau:500: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:521: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkā nānārutaghoṣā nānādhyāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutaghoṣavijñaptito niścarati /
S04jnalokau:523: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nātīto nānāgato na pratyutpannaḥ,
S04jnalokau:535: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:557: atha ca mañjuśrīr nānāvimuktāḥ sattvā nānādhyāśayavijñaptitas tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti //
S04jnalokau:564: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivīṃ niśritya pṛthivīṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:569: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:570: śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā mahāyānikānāṃ vā,
S04jnalokau:572: yāni cānyāny antaśo mithyātvaniyatānāṃ kuśalamūlāni sarvāṇi tāni tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:573: na ca mañjuśrīs tathāgataḥ kalpayati, na vikalpayati /
S04jnalokau:592: tadyathā mañjuśrīr ākāśaṃ sarvatra samaṃ nirvikalpaṃ nirviśeṣam,
S04jnalokau:616: atha mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsthānasya hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭatayākāśaṃ hīnotkṛṣṭaṃ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:617: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvatra samo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04jnalokau:636: atha ca mañjuśrīr ye hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāśayāḥ sattvās te hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti //
S04jnalokau:638: ayaṃ hīnādhyāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya hīnāṃ rūpakāyavarṇapariniṣpattiṃ darśayiṣyāmi /
S04jnalokau:639: ayaṃ madhyāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya madhyamāṃ rūpakāyavarṇapariniṣpattiṃ darśayiṣyāmi /
S04jnalokau:640: ayam udārāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asyodārāṃ rūpakāyavarṇapariniṣpattiṃ darśayiṣyāmi //
S04jnalokau:643: ayaṃ hīnādhimuktaḥ [JĀA_47] sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya hīnāṃ śrāvakayānakathāṃ kariṣye /
S04jnalokau:644: ayaṃ madhyāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya pratyekabuddhayānakathāṃ kariṣye /
S04jnalokau:645: ayam udārāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya mahāyānakathāṃ kariṣye //
S04jnalokau:647: ayam udārādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya dānakathāṃ kariṣye //
S04jnalokau:648: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
S04jnalokau:650: ayaṃ prajñāpāramitādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ kathāṃ kathayiṣye /
S04jnalokau:663: na mañjuśrīs tathāgatasya nāmarūpaniruktyānusāri vijñānaṃ pravartate /
S04jnalokau:664: na mañjuśrīs tathāgataḥ kalpayati, na vikalpayati /
S04jnalokau:666: sarvadharmasamatākoṭī mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ samaḥ sarvatra nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04jnalokau:668: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, nirvikalpā nirviśeṣāḥ, na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭāḥ /
S04jnalokau:671: yā mañjuśrīr anupalabdhiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sā samatā,
S04jnalokau:677: evaṃ darśinaś ca viparyastāc cittacaitasikā na pravartante /
S04jnalokau:681: yadā na pracarati tadā na saṃcarati /
S04jnalokau:682: yadā na saṃcarati tadā na visarati /
S04jnalokau:692: yaś ca niyāmaprāptaḥ sa sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati /
S04jnalokau:693: yadā sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati tadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati /
S04jnalokau:694: yadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati tadā na bhavati na vibhavati /
S04jnalokau:695: yadā na bhavati na vibhavati tadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati /
S04jnalokau:696: yadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati tadā yoniśodharmaprayukto bhavati /
S04jnalokau:697: yoniśodharmaprayuktasya na kaścid dharmo 'sti yo na buddhadharmaḥ /
S04jnalokau:710: na tatra prayogo na pramāṇaṃ na phalasākṣātkriyā /
S04jnalokau:712: prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ tac cāgantukair upakleśair upakliśyate na ca prakṛtiḥ saṃkliśyate /
S04jnalokau:714: yā cāsaṃkleśatā tatra pratipakṣo nāsti yena pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ syāt /
S04jnalokau:716: na śuddhaḥ śudhyati śuddha eva saḥ /
S04jnalokau:719: yaś cāninditaḥ sa nandīprahāṇaṃ tatra sarvasnehā nirudhyante /
S04jnalokau:730: tathatāpratiṣṭhitāś ca sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtāś ca /
S04jnalokau:731: yā ca tathatā na tatra saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ /
S04jnalokau:732: yatra na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ sā tathatā /
S04jnalokau:739: yā najātutathatā sā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate /
S04jnalokau:740: yā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate sā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
S04jnalokau:741: yā notpadyate na nirudhyate sā nirvāṇena samā /
S04jnalokau:742: yā nirvāṇena samā sā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti /
S04jnalokau:743: yā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti sā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
S04jnalokau:744: yā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā sā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā /
S04jnalokau:745: yā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā sā tathatā //
S04jnalokau:749: tathaiva tathatā cātmā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
S04jnalokau:758: yad arthānugamajñānaṃ vijñānānugamaṃ cedam ucyate jñānam /
S04jnalokau:763: yārthānugamajñānena vijñānānugamajñānena nītārthānugamajñānena ca sā dharmatā /
S04jnalokau:765: sā ca dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā, sā dharme na pravartate /
S04jnalokau:766: yā dharmasyāpravṛttiḥ, yā cārthavyaṃjanasamatā sādvayārthe samā /
S04jnalokau:767: yā ca samatā so 'rthaḥ, sā cārthajñānena samatā, sādvayamukhapraveśena jñānasamatā //
S04jnalokau:793: tatra bodhisattvena saṃkleśahetur vyavadānahetuś ca parijñātavyaḥ /
S04jnalokau:794: saṃkleśahetuviśuddhyā ca vyavadānaviśuddhyā ca na sthātavyam//
S04jnalokau:815: saṃkṣiptena sarve 'kuśalā manaskārāḥ saṃkleśasya hetuḥ, sarve kuśalā manaskārā vyavadānasya hetuḥ //
S04jnalokau:818: sarve te dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā asvāmikā aparigrahā nirvyāpārā māyopamā alakṣaṇā adhyātmopaśāntāḥ /
S04jnalokau:829: na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasyotpādo nirodho vā bhavet //
S04jnalokau:833: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatena bodhiḥ prāptā /
S04jnalokau:837: tatra katamad bhagavan mūlaṃ katamat pratiṣṭhānam /
S04jnalokau:840: tat tathāgatena mañjuśrīr bodhisamatayā sarvadharmasamatā jñātā /
S04jnalokau:841: tasmād ucyate mañjuśrīr amūlāpratiṣṭhānā tathāgatena bodhir abhisaṃbuddheti //
S04jnalokau:852: cakśur mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
S04jnalokau:853: sa cakṣuḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya rūpeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
S04jnalokau:854: evaṃ śrotraṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
S04jnalokau:855: sa śrotraṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya śabdeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
S04jnalokau:856: ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
S04jnalokau:857: sa ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya gandheṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
S04jnalokau:858: jihvā śūnyātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyā eṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
S04jnalokau:859: sa jihvā śūnyeti parijñāya raseṣu na [JĀA_55] dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
S04jnalokau:860: kāyaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
S04jnalokau:861: sa kāyaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya spraṣṭavyeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
S04jnalokau:862: mano mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
S04jnalokau:863: sa manaḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya dharmeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti //
S04jnalokau:884: tathā cāvatārṣīd yathā tathatāyā nāpāraṃ na pāraṃ samanupaśyati /
S04jnalokau:909: yas traidhātuke 'gocaraḥ, ayaṃ mañjuśrīr āryāṇāṃ gocaraḥ //
S04jnalokau:916: bodhir mañjuśrīr nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā tryadhvasamā trimaṇḍalaparicchinnā /
S04jnalokau:921: sa cittamanovijñānāpratiṣṭhito na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S04jnalokau:922: anavakalpayann avikalpayan nātītaṃ karoty anāgataṃ na manyate pratyutpannaṃ na prapañcayati //
S04jnalokau:932: yan mañjuśrīr na cittamanovijñānavijñeyaṃ tad asaṃskṛtam /
S04jnalokau:933: asaṃskṛtam ucyate yatra notpādo na sthitir na vyayaḥ /
S04jnalokau:937: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'svabhāvaḥ, tatra nāsti dvayam iti //
S04jnalokau:966: bodhir mañjuśrīr na kāyenābhisambudhyate na cittena /
S04jnalokau:969: cittaṃ ca māyopamaṃ riktaṃ tuccham abhūtam asaṃskṛtam /
S04jnalokau:970: yo mañjuśrīr evaṃ kāyasya cittasya cāvabodhaḥ, ayam ucyate mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ /
S04jnalokau:973: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kāyena vā cittena vā dharmeṇa vā adharmeṇa vā bhūtena vābhūtena vā satyena vā mṛṣā vā vacanīyā //
S04jnalokau:982: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kiñcit sthānaṃ yena ca vyavahāraṃ gacchet /
S04jnalokau:983: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśasthānam asaṃskṛtam anutpannam aniruddham avacanīyaṃ tathā mañjuśrīr bodhir asaṃskṛtāsthānānutpannāniruddhāvacanīyā /
S04jnalokau:984: yathā mañjuśrīr bhūtaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ sarvadharmair avacanīyam,
S04jnalokau:985: evam eva mañjuśrīr bodhir bhūtā parigaveṣyamāṇā sarvadharmair avacanīyā /
S04jnalokau:1004: abhisaṃbudhya cakṣuṣo 'nanugrahāya rūpānupalabdhitaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ na pratiṣṭhitam /
